our cooperations

We work with a diverse set of partners, ranging from state institutions and well-known universities to prominent commercial firms.

Lviv Polytechnic National University

Lviv Polytechnic National University is one of the most prominent centers of technical sciences and technological growth in Central Europe.

Forschungszentrum Julich

The organization has verious sphere of knowledge: from materials science and optical simulations to nanotechnologies and biosciences and brain research.

University of Anger

11 percent of its 20,000 pupils are inter-national students. They attend eight faculties, schools, and institutes. In addition, 7 central university services are accessible.

ENERGIA OZE ltd

Focuses on power systems, renewable energy sources, and electrical circuits, as well as developing measuring techniques and systems.

Politechnika Częstochowska

Częstochowa University of Technology, founded in 1949, is a state technical university in Częstochowie. One of Central Europe's most prominent centers of technical sciences and technological growth.

SmartMembranes

The leader in high-ordered porous alumina and silicon materials with defined and tunable membrane characteristics and structure parameters.

Scientific Research Company ‘Carat’

A non-academic institution that develops measurement methods and systems as well as synthesizes crystalline materials for industrial uses.

Warsaw University of Technology

An important component of the Warsaw University of Technology's aim is to answer to modern science and economic concerns through technology transfer, as well as to bring research results to practical implementation.

the newest technologies

We use a wide range of technologies to effectively address unusual challenges and achieve any of your business goals.

Frontend

Frontend is all graphical aspects of a website or application. It includes all features, with which users can interact directly.

  • React
  • Next.js
  • Gatsby
  • Redux
  • GraphQL
  • TypeScript
  • Single-Spa

backend

Backend creates complex server-side parts and logic of a product. It organizes and stores data and makes sure that the website's client side functions properly.

databases

Database is an organized collection of structured data. It helps to implement a wide range of complex business solutions.

infrastructure

Infrastructure refers to the whole of the parts required for the administration and operation of the IT environment of a company and all inner processes.

automation

Automation is in charge of efficiently implementing all business operations with the least amount of human involvement.

Design

Design is the process of creating a product's aesthetic look. A good design makes it easier for visitors to browse a website/app and ensures that business objectives are met.
